original_title: Mila Tu. Devenir femme Massaï sans l'excision
overview: Evokes the personal trajectory of a Tanzanian Massai woman refusing genital mutilation. Directed by two NGO volunteers from Luxemburg working on a development project in Tanzania. Released in 2009, this film has been broadcasted since in various film festivals in Europe, on the occasion of different AR actions in Luxemburg and on national television (RTL).
title: Mila Tu. Becoming a Massaï woman without mutilation
